sensorthings.components.things package

Submodules

sensorthings.components.things.engine module

class sensorthings.components.things.engine.ThingBaseEngine

Bases: object

Abstract base class for handling Things.

This class defines the required methods for managing things. These methods must be implemented to allow the SensorThings API to interface with an underlying database.

abstract create_thing(thing)

Create a new thing.

Parameters:

thing (dict) – The thing data to be created.

Returns:

The ID of the newly created thing.

Return type:

str

abstract delete_thing(thing_id)

Delete a thing.

Parameters:

thing_id (str) – The ID of the thing to delete.

Return type:

None

abstract get_things(thing_ids=None, location_ids=None, pagination=None, ordering=None, filters=None, expanded=False)

Retrieve things based on provided parameters.

Parameters:

  • thing_ids (List[str], optional) – List of thing IDs to filter the results.

  • location_ids (List[str], optional) – List of location IDs to filter the results.

  • pagination (dict, optional) – Pagination information to limit the number of results.

  • ordering (dict, optional) – Ordering information to sort the results.

  • filters (dict, optional) – Additional filters to apply to the query.

  • expanded (bool, optional) – Whether to include expanded information in the results.

Return type:

(Dict[str, dict], int)

Returns:

  • Dict[str, dict] – A dictionary of things, keyed by their IDs.

  • int – The total number of things matching the query.

abstract update_thing(thing_id, thing)

Update an existing thing.

Parameters:

  • thing_id (str) – The ID of the thing to update.

  • thing (dict) – The updated thing data.

Return type:

None

sensorthings.components.things.schemas module

class sensorthings.components.things.schemas.Thing(**data)

Bases: BaseComponent, ThingFields, ThingRelations

A schema representing a thing.

This class combines the fields and relations of a thing, and extends the BaseComponent class.

class sensorthings.components.things.schemas.ThingRelations(**data)

Bases: Schema

A schema representing the relations of a thing to other components.

The locations associated with the thing.

Type:

List[‘Location’]

The historical locations associated with the thing.

Type:

List[‘HistoricalLocation’]

The datastreams associated with the thing.

Type:

List[‘Datastream’]

locations: List[Location]

model_fields: ClassVar[dict[str, FieldInfo]] = {'datastreams': FieldInfo(annotation=List[ForwardRef('Datastream')], required=False, default=[], alias='Datastreams', alias_priority=2, json_schema_extra={'relationship': 'one_to_many', 'back_ref': 'thing_id'}), 'historical_locations': FieldInfo(annotation=List[ForwardRef('HistoricalLocation')], required=False, default=[], alias='HistoricalLocations', alias_priority=2, json_schema_extra={'relationship': 'one_to_many', 'back_ref': 'thing_id'}), 'locations': FieldInfo(annotation=List[ForwardRef('Location')], required=False, default=[], alias='Locations', alias_priority=2, json_schema_extra={'relationship': 'many_to_many', 'back_ref': 'thing_id'})}
